import { CalendarIcon, UserIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { ChevronLeftIcon, ChevronRightIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' import axios from 'axios'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function HomePage() { const [blogs,Setblogs] = useState([]); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { document.title = 'ForendonBlog | Ana Sayfa'; const fetchAllblogs = async () => { const getblogs = await axios.get("http://localhost:7007/api/posts"); const blogsdata = getblogs.data; const reversedData = [...blogsdata].reverse(); Setblogs(reversedData) } fetchAllblogs() }, []); const formatDate = (dateString) => { const options = { day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' }; const date = new Date(dateString); return date.toLocaleDateString('tr-TR', options); }; const handleNavigationblog = () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); navigate(`/blog/${blog.id}`) }; return (
{blogs?.map((blog) => (

{blog?.cate?.toUpperCase()}

{blog.title}

Yazar: {blog.username}

{formatDate(blog.date)}

{blog?.desc.slice(0,500)}...

))}
Previous Next

97 sonuçtan 1 ile 10 {' '} arası gösteriliyor

Previous 1 2 3 ... 8 9 10 Next
); }
